citation.article-title: Tepidamorphusgemmatus gen. nov.,sp.nov.,a slightly thermophilic member of the Alphaproteobacteria

p.s: Description of Tepidamorphus gemmatus sp. nov.
Tepidamorphus gemmatus (gem.ma’tus. L. masc. adj. gemmatus, provided with buds).
Forms short rod-shaped cells 1.0–1.5 μm in length and 0.5–2.0 μm in width.
Colonies on Degryse medium 162 are not pigmented.
The optimum growth temperature is about 45–50 °C; growth does not occur at 25 and 55 °C.
The optimum pH for growth is between 7.5 and 8.5; growth does not occur at pH 6.0 and pH 10.0.
Grows in media without added salt; the optimum NaCl concentration for growth is 0–1% and grows in media with up to 3% NaCl.
Yeast extract is required for growth.
Thiosulfate is not oxidized to sulfate.
Nitrate is reduced to nitrite.
Bacteriochlorophyll a and carotenoid pigments are not detected.
The major fatty acids are 19:0cyclo ω8c and 18:0.
Gelatine, casein and hippurate were degraded; starch, esculin, arbutin, xylan, and elastin were not degraded.
DNAse negative.

Alkaline phosphatase, esterase (C 4), esterase lipase (C 8), leucine arylamidase, valine arylamidase, trypsin, acid phosphatase, naphthol-AS-BI-phosphohydrolase positive in the API ZYM, other activities were negative.

Glucose, fructose, galactose, l-rhamnose, ribose, xylose, l-arabinose, glycerol, α-ketoglutarate, lactate, acetate, pyruvate, succinate, glutamate, gluconate, alanine, asparagine, histidine, lysine, proline, glutamine, serine and valine are assimilated.

Mannose, l-fucose, l-sorbose, d-arabinose, sucrose, maltose, lactose, cellobiose, trehalose, raffinose, melibiose, ribitol, xylitol, sorbitol, mannitol, myo-inositol, erythritol, d-arabitol, l-arabitol, malate, citrate, benzoate, fumarate, glucoronate, aspartate, glycine, arginine are not assimilated.
Acid is produced from the following carbohydrates using the API 50 CH: glycerol, ribose, d-xylose, l-xylose, glucose, fructose, l-sorbose, turanose, lyxose, tagatose and potassium 5-ketogluconate.
The DNA of strain CB-27AT has a G+C content of 66.9±0.2 mol% (HPLC method).
The type strain CB-27AT (=DSM 19345T=LMG 24113T) was isolated from a runoff of the hot spring known as Caldeira da Barrela, Furnas, on the Island of São Miguel in the Azores.
Strain CB-26A (=DSM 19344=LMG 24114) is an additional strain of this species.
